description.title: Rooms
description.html: The Level rooms provide a full range of amenities and also take care of every detail to ensure that guests don’t miss a thing. Rest and enjoy all the relaxation you deserve or make the most of all the great leisure options. These fully equipped rooms offer the finest services so you don’t have to worry about a thing.

rooms.detailedDescription:
Elegant, quiet and bright rooms measuring 26m2, fully equipped for maximum comfort in the centre of Madrid. They provide a magnificent king-size bed, queen-size bed or two single beds (on request and subject to availability on arrival), functional desk, Wi-Fi, comfortable armchair and large, full bathroom with amenities by Meliá.

**Cot available on request subject to availability.

Services

  • 24 hour room service
  • 24 hour concierge and porter service
  • 24 hour wake-up call service
  • Laundry, dry-cleaning and ironing service. Possibility of Express Service (on request) (*)
  • Babysitting service (*) (on request) 
  • Digital Press Service

Equipment

  • Wi-Fi internet
  • Minibar (*)
  • Safe large enough for laptop
  • Telephones in bedroom and bathroom, with voice mail and in-coming calls services
  • 32 inch LCD interactive satellite TV with the main Spanish and international channels and radio channels
  • Movie channel (*)
  • Large and comfortable workspace with desk
  • Reading area with armchair
  • Full length mirror
  • Exclusive mattress for maximum comfort
  • Choice of pillows
  • Selection of coffees and teas
  • Blackout curtains
  • Windows with double glazing
  • Iron and ironing board
  • Air conditioning/heating
  • Smoke detectors
  • Electronic lock
  • MELIÁ bathroom amenities
  • Hairdryer and make-up mirror
  • Cot free of charge (on request)
  • Rooms for smokers (on request)

(*) With charge

rooms.detailedDescription:
For family getaways, the family room includes an extra bed for a child. Spacious, quiet and bright rooms measuring 37 m2, fully equipped for maximum comfort in the centre of Madrid. The rooms provide a magnificent double bed * or two single beds (on request and subject to availability on arrival at the hotel), a functional work space, Wi-Fi internet, a comfortable armchair and a large, full bathroom with Meliá bathroom amenities.

Available with king size bed or queen size bed. Cot on request and subject to availability. Rooms available for guests with restricted mobility on request.

rooms.name: HABITACION FAMILIAR TRIPLE

rooms.detailedDescription:
The 52 m2 The Level Junior Suite provides two different areas: a lounge with sofa and work area and a large bedroom with a 1.60 m-wide bed. The areas are separated by sliding doors and allow the space to be combined or separated according to your needs.

This comfortable Suite with city views provides all the facilities required to make you feel at home. It features two 32-inch LCD TVs, Wi-Fi, Nespresso coffee maker with a selection of capsules and different flavours of tea. The bathroom has everything you need to relax and recover after long days discovering the capital.

This Suite also allows access to the exquisite personalised services of The Level, designed for the most discerning travellers. This special attribute offerss free ironing of one garment per stay, access to the private The Level Lounge with a private reception area for check-in and check-out, breakfast buffet and snacks and refreshments during practically the entire day. Get the most out of Madrid by staying in the perfect place.

Services

  • The Level reception for private check-in and check-out
  • Late check-out on request and subject to availability
  • Exquisite and personalised attention in an exclusive and relaxed atmosphere
  • Complimentary breakfast buffet from 7am to 10:30am from Monday to Friday and 7am to 11am Saturday and Sunday
  • Sample some of our delicious sweet and savoury snacks, coffee or soft drinks from 12 noon to 11pm
  • Delicious hot tapas and an open bar with premium-brand drinks from 6pm to 9pm
  • 24-hour room service
  • 24-hour concierge
  • 24-hour wake-up calls
  • Digital Press Service
  • Local and international newspapers available 
  • Turn-down service
  • Ironing of one item per stay free of charge, except suits
  • Laundry, dry-cleaning and ironing service. Possibility of Express Service (on request) (*)
  • ​24-hour gym
  • Free meeting room per room per stay for up to 1 hour on request and subject to availability

 Equipment

  • Welcome gift
  • Nespresso machine with a selection of coffee capsules and selection of infusions
  • Free Wi-Fi
  • Minibar (*)
  • Safe large enough for laptop
  • 2 32 inch interactive LCD satellite TVs with the main Spanish and international channels and radio channels
  • Tea set with a selection of teas and infusions
  • Spacious and comfortable work space with desk
  • Reading area with armchair
  • Full length mirror
  • Luxury mattress for maximum comfort
  • Choice of pillows
  • Blackout curtains
  • Windows with double glazing for perfect exterior soundproofing
  • Iron and ironing board
  • Air conditioning/heating
  • Hairdryer and make-up mirror
  • Bathroom amenities by RITUALS
  • Smoke detectors
  • Electronic lock
  • Exclusive The Level bathrobe and slippers

(*) With charge

rooms.name: THE LEVEL JUNIOR SUITE

rooms.detailedDescription:
Enjoy your stay in Madrid from the comfort of this fully equipped 26 m2 room with city views.  The double-glazed windows guarantee soundproofing and the silence you need to rest or to work if you are in the city on business.

Decorated with a perfect combination of the classical and the avant-garde, it has all the equipment you need for fun or work depending on the reason for your trip.

Equipped with a 32-inch LCD TV, Wi-Fi, Nespresso coffee maker with a choice of capsules and teas. The full bathroom provides everything you need to relax and recover after long days discovering Madrid.

The room also provides access to all The Level services and a fully personalised Meliá Castilla experience. Services such as a private reception area, private breakfast buffet, access to The Level Lounge with snacks, soft drinks and tapas served throughout the day, cocktail hour in the afternoon with hot drinks and snacks, a gym and a meeting room for two hours per room per stay on request.

Services

  • The Level reception for private check-in and check-out
  • Late check-out on request and subject to availability
  • Exquisite and personalised service in an exclusive and relaxed atmosphere
  • Buffet breakfast included (7am to 10:30am Monday to Friday and 7am to 11am Saturday and Sunday)
  • Sample some of our delicious sweet and savoury snacks, coffee or soft drinks from 12 noon to 11pm
  • Delicious hot tapas and an open bar with premium-brand drinks from 6pm to 9pm
  • 24-hour room service
  • 24-hour concierge
  • 24-hour wake-up calls
  • Local and international newspapers available
  • Spanish and international newspapers

  • Ironing of one item per stay free of charge, except suits
  • Laundry, dry-cleaning and ironing service. Possibility of Express Service (on request) (*)
  • 24-hour gym
  • Free meeting room per room per stay for up to 1 hour on request and subject to availability

Equipment

  • Nespresso machine with a variety of capsules and a selection of infusions.
  • Wi-Fi
  • Minibar (*)
  • Safe large enough for laptop
  • 32 inch interactive LCD satellite TV with the main Spanish and international channels and radio channels

  • Reading area with armchair

  • Windows with double glazing for perfect exterior soundproofing

  • Bathroom amenities by RITUALS

(*) With charge

rooms.name: THE LEVEL DELUXE ROOM

rooms.detailedDescription:
Madrid is at your feet from this stunning 70 m2 Suite with impressive views of the capital. The Suite is located on the 15th floor of The Level at Meliá Castilla and comprises a bedroom, two bathrooms and a lounge with work area so you have everything you need if you are on business in Madrid. 

The Suite provides double glazing to ensure the most efficient soundproofing. Rest is assured in a space in which everything has been carefully designed to ensure you enjoy an unforgettable stay in Madrid. The bedroom provides two 1.10m-wide beds and a selection of pillows so you can choose the one that best meets your needs. It also provides two 32-inch LCD TVs.

The bathroom has everything you need for relaxation after a day of work or sightseeing in Madrid, as well as bathroom amenities by LOEWE, a bathrobe and slippers. 

The exquisite The Level service also includes a private breakfast buffet and access to the sophisticated The Level Lounge, a private space for The Level guests serving snacks, soft drinks and tapas almost all day long.

Services

  • Late check-out on request and subject to availability.
  • Exquisite personalised service in an exclusive yet relaxed ambience
  • Buffet breakfast included (7am to 10:30am Monday to Friday and 7am to 11am Saturday and Sunday)
  • Sample some of our delicious sweet and savoury snacks, coffee or soft drinks from 12 noon to 11pm
  • Delicious hot tapas and an open bar with premium-brand drinks from 6pm to 9pm
  • 24-hour room service
  • 24-hour concierge

  • 24-hour gym
  • Free meeting room per room per stay for up to 1 hour on request and subject to availability

  • Nespresso machine with a selection of coffee capsules and selection of infusions
  • Free Wi-Fi
  • Minibar (*)
  • Safe large enough for laptop
  • 2 32 inch interactive LCD satellite TVs with the main Spanish and international channels and radio channels
  • Tea set with a selection of teas and infusions
  • Spacious and comfortable work space with desk

The Suite is located on the 15th floor of The Level at Meliá Castilla and comprises a bedroom, two bathrooms and a lounge with work area so you have everything you need if you are on business in Madrid.
rooms.name: THE LEVEL GRAND SUITE

rooms.detailedDescription:
Classical style and modernity combine in two well-defined spaces. Enjoy a great night's sleep in the bedroom in the comfortable king-size bed or a coffee and time for relaxation in the lounge.

A room combining grey, blue and ochre tones to provide a touch of elegance and peace to the bedroom and a reading chair for enjoying a good book. The lounge has space to work or relax and enjoy your leisure time with a Nespresso coffee or tea. The Level Castilla Suite offers exclusivity and exquisite service together with wonderful views of Madrid thanks to a location on the 15th floor.

The fully equipped bathroom provides a shower, bathtub, hairdryer, make-up mirror, superior quality bathroom amenities and a walk-in closet. Take a revitalizing shower after a hard day's work or relax in a steaming foam bath. Enjoy the Wi-Fi, private breakfast buffet, access to The Level Lounge, 24-hour room service and an unforgettable in The Level Castilla Suite.

Services

Private reception area for check-in and check-out.

rooms.name: FAMILY CONNECTING ROOMS

rooms.detailedDescription:
Decorated in warm tones with fabrics and furniture that create a quiet and relaxing space. Spacious and bright rooms measuring 37 m2, and fully equipped to provide maximum comfort for you to enjoy during your stay in the centre of Madrid.

The Supreme rooms offer a magnificent king-size bed, queen-size bed or two single beds (on request and subject to availability on arrival), desk, armchair, wardrobe with internal light, Wi-Fi and a modern, full complete bathroom designed by Jacob de la Font with separate bathtub and shower and amenities by Meliá.

** Cot on request and subject to availability

  • 24-hour concierge and porters

rooms.name: SUPREME ROOM

rooms.detailedDescription:
Sit back and enjoy the exquisite The Level service staying in this functional, sophisticated and comfortable 37 m2 room with city views. The room provides two 1.10m-wide beds or a large king-size bed while the bathroom has everything you need to relax and recover after a long day in Madrid. 

The room provides a work space with a desk and relaxation area with an armchair. It also features a Nespresso coffee maker, tea service and minibar so you can relax with a drink without having to leave your room. It also has Wi-Fi, two 32-inch LCD TVs and access to the 24-hour gym.

Efficient double glazing guarantees total soundproofing and peaceful rest with no noise from outside. 

The bathroom has everything you need to relax and recover after long days discovering the capital. 

The room also allows access to The Level Lounge, a private lounge for The Level guests where you can enjoy snacks, soft drinks and tapas almost all day long.

The Premium Triple Rooms offer a magnificent double bed or two single beds (on request and subject to availability on arrival at the hotel) an extra single bed, a desk, Wi-Fi Internet, a comfortable chair and a large, full bathroom with Meliá amenities.

Available with a king or queen-size double bed and an extra single bed. No additional room for another extra bed or baby cot.

rooms.name: MELIA CONNECTING ROOM

rooms.detailedDescription:
The Kids & Co. rooms are perfect for families with children thanks to their size and services. The Kids & Co. city program, where the children come first, includes: children's check in, passport, a soft toy gift, room with children's pillowcase and towels, children's amenities in the bathroom as well as a milk drink and biscuits for the children before bedtime.

For family getaways, family room includes an extra child’s bed. Spacious, peaceful and bright rooms of 37 m², totally equipped for you to enjoy the utmost comfort in the city centre. The Premium rooms offer a magnificent double bed or two twins (on request and subject to availability on arrival at the hotel), a practical work table, Internet access (Wi-Fi), a comfortable armchair and a spacious and complete bathroom, where you will find a set of Meliá amenities.

Available with King or Queen size bed. Cots are available on request and subject to availability. Adapted rooms for guests with limited mobility are available on request.

Services

  • 24 room service
  • 24 hour concierge and porter service
  • 24 hour wake-up call
  • Digital Press Service
  • Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service. Possibility of Express Service (on request) (*)
  • Babysitting (*) (on request)
  • Free supervised Mini Club service (please consult opening hours with the hotel)

  • Minibar (*)
  • Selection of coffees and teas
  • Safe large enough for laptop
  • Telephone in the room and in the bathroom with voicemail and calls on hold
  • 32 inch interactive and satellite LCD TV with Spanish and international channels and radio
  • Movie channel (*)
  • Functional and comfortable work space with desk
  • Reading area with comfy armchair
  • Full length mirror

  • Full set of Meliá bathroom amenities
  • Hairdryer and make-up mirror
  • Free cot (on request)
  • Rooms for smokers (on request)
  • Rooms suitable for guests with reduced mobility (on request)

(*) With charge
rooms.description: The Kids & Co. rooms are perfect for families with children thanks to their size and services. The Kids & Co. city program, where the children come first, includes: children's check in, passport, a soft toy gift, room with children's pillowcase and towels, children's amenities in the bathroom as well as a milk drink and biscuits for the children before bedtime.
rooms.name: PREMIUM FAMILY KIDS & CO

rooms.detailedDescription:
The Kids & Co. rooms are perfect for families with children thanks to their size and services. The Kids & Co. city program, where the children come first, includes: children's check in, passport, a soft toy gift, room with children's pillowcase and towels, children's amenities in the bathroom as well as a milk drink and biscuits for the children before bedtime.

There’s nothing better than the family getaway. A combination of two double rooms, of 26 m² each, with two TVs and two bathrooms. Outward-facing, peaceful and bright, these rooms can be joined or separated as you wish.

No extra bed or cot will be permitted.

Services

rooms.detailedDescription:
With an elegant and functional design making the most of their 26m2, these fully-equipped rooms are ideal for enjoying maximum comfort in the centre of Madrid.

They provide a magnificent double bed or twin beds (on request and subject to availability), work space, Wi-Fi, armchair, walk-in closet and a modern bathroom with Meliá bathroom amenities.

Services

  • 24-hour room service
  • 24-hour concierge and porter service
  • 24-hour wake-up call
  • Laundry, dry-cleaning and ironing service. Express service also available (*) (on request)
  • Babysitting service (*) (on request)
  • Digital press service

Equipment

  • Wi-Fi
  • Minibar (*)
  • Safe large enough for laptop
  • Telephones in bedroom and bathroom with voice mail
  • 32-inch interactive LCD satellite TV with the main Spanish and international channels and radio channels
  • Movie channel (*)
  • Large and comfortable work space with desk
  • Reading area with armchair
  • Full-length mirror
  • Exclusive mattress for maximum comfort
  • Choice of pillows
  • Kettle with a selection of coffees and teas
  • Blackout curtains
  • Windows with double glazing
  • Iron and ironing board
  • Air conditioning and heating
  • Smoke detector
  • Electronic door lock
  • Meliá bathroom amenities
  • Hairdryer and make-up mirror
  • Baby cot free of charge (on request)
  • Rooms for smokers (on request)

(*) With charge
rooms.description: With an elegant and functional design making the most of their 26m2, these fully-equipped rooms are ideal for enjoying maximum comfort in the centre of Madrid.
rooms.name: DELUXE ROOM

rooms.detailedDescription:
Live a The Level experience in one of our The Level Connected Family Rooms.

Measuring 37 m2, the Premium Room The Level, connects with a Deluxe Room The Level measuring 26 m2. Both rooms have outdoor views and a king-size bed or two single beds, as well as two completely separate bathrooms.

Bright, spacious and elegant rooms designed to create unforgettable experiences by paying careful attention to the luxury and functionality of its spaces. 

The best care for the little ones, with Meliá Kids&Co providing a welcome kit that includes: fluffy toy, special pillow cover, towels and bathroom amenities, plus milkshake and cookies before bed on arrival day.

The room provides a work space with a desk and relaxation area with an armchair. Enjoy a Nespresso coffee, tea or snack from the minibar without having to leave your room. It also provides Wi-Fi, two 55-inch LCD TVs and a 24-hour gym. Double glazing guarantees the soundproofing of the room and undisturbed rest. 

The Level provides access to private areas such as The Level Lounge, where guests can enjoy tapas, drinks and snacks throughout the day.

Specially designed for kids, every morning in the Cervantes Room they can enjoy the Kids Corner at breakfast, the best accompaniment of The Level Lounge. Access to the Mini-Club totally free and only for children staying in the hotel (check days and opening hours)

Services

  • Private reception area for check-in and check-out.
  • Late check-out on request and subject to availability.
  • Exquisite personalised service in an exclusive yet relaxed ambience
  • Complimentary breakfast buffet from 7am to 10:30am from Monday to Friday and 7am to 11am Saturday and Sunday
  • Sample some of our delicious sweet and savoury snacks, coffee or soft drinks from 12 noon to 11pm
  • Delicious hot tapas and an open bar with premium-brand drinks from 6pm to 9pm
  • 24-hour room service
  • 24-hour concierge
  • 24-hour wake-up calls
  • Local and international newspapers available 
  • Digital press service
  • Turndown service every evening
  • Free ironing of one garment per stay, excluding suits
  • Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service Express laundry on request (*)
  • 24-hour gym
  • Free meeting room per room per stay for up to 1 hour on request and subject to availability
  • Supervised Mini-Club (check days and opening hours)
  • Kids&Co that includes: fluffy toy, special pillow covers, towels and bathroom amenities, and milkshake and cookies before bed on arrival day

Facilities

  • Welcome details
  • Nespresso coffee maker with selection of capsules and teas
  • Wi-Fi 
  • Minibar (*)
  • Laptop-sized safe
  • Two 55-inch LCD interactive satellite TVs with local and international TV and radio channels
  • Selection of different types of tea
  • Large, comfortable work area with desk  
  • Reading area with armchair
  • Full-length mirror
  • Luxury mattresses for maximum comfort
  • Choice of pillows
  • Black-out curtains
  • Double-glazed windows for perfect soundproofing
  • Iron and ironing board
  • Air-conditioning and heating
  • Hairdryer and make-up mirror
  • Bathroom amenities by RITUALS
  • Smoke detector
  • Electronic lock
  • The Level bathrobe and slippers

(*) Extra charge
rooms.description:
Live a The Level experience in one of our The Level Connected Family Rooms.

Measuring 37m2, the Premium Room The Level, connects with a Deluxe Room The Level measuring 26 m2. Both rooms have outdoor views and a king-size bed or two single beds, as well as two completely separate bathrooms.
rooms.name: THE LEVEL CONNECTED FAMILY ROOM

rooms.detailedDescription:
Discover the distinguished The Level service in this 37 m2 room with city views and functional, sophisticated facilities in a space to share with friends or family. The large bathroom with double sink, shower and bathtub will help you freshen up after an intense day of sightseeing in Madrid. 

Excellent soundproofing is guaranteed by double glazing, creating the ideal environment for undisturbed rest. The room has a work area with a desk, relaxation area and reading corner. There is also a Nespresso coffee maker, tea and infusions, and a minibar so you can have a drink without having to leave your room. 

The bathroom has everything you need to relax and recover after long days discovering the capital. The room also allows access to The Level Lounge, a private lounge for The Level guests where you can enjoy snacks, soft drinks and tapas almost all day long. We offer a 24-hour concierge service, Wi-Fi, a 55-inch LCD TV and a 24-hour gym.

THE LEVEL BENEFITS

  • Welcome details
  • Nespresso coffee maker with selection of capsules
  • The Level bathrobe and slippers
  • Turndown service every evening
  • Access to the private The Level Lounge with buffet breakfast included (from 7am to 10:30am Monday to Friday and 7am to 11am Saturday and Sunday), delicious sweet and savoury snacks, coffee and refreshments (from 12 midday to 11pm) and lovely hot tapas and an Open Bar with premium-brand drinks (from 6pm to 9pm)
  • Private reception area for check-in and check-out in The Level Lounge
  • Late check-out on request and subject to availability
  • Free meeting room per room per stay for up to 1 hour for up to 6 people, on request and subject to availability 
  • Free ironing of one garment per stay, excluding suits

SERVICES

  • 24-hour room service
  • 24-hour concierge
  • 24-hour wake-up calls
  • Local and international newspapers available
  • Digital press service
  • Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service Express service available on request (*) 
  • 24-hour gym

FACILITIES

  • Laptop-sized safe
  • Two 55-inch LCD interactive satellite TVs with local and international TV and radio channels
  • Large, comfortable work area with desk  
  • Reading area with armchair
  • Full-length mirror
  • Luxury mattresses for maximum comfort
  • Choice of pillows
  • Black-out curtains
  • Double-glazed windows for perfect soundproofing
  • Iron and ironing board
  • Bathroom amenities by RITUALS
  • Air-conditioning and heating
  • Hairdryer and make-up mirror
  • Wi-Fi 
  • Minibar (*)

(*) Extra charge
rooms.description: Discover the distinguished The Level service in this 37 m2 room with city views and functional, sophisticated facilities in a space to share with friends or family. The large bathroom with double sink, shower and bathtub will help you freshen up after an intense day of sightseeing in Madrid.
rooms.name: THE LEVEL TRIPLE ROOM

description.title: Restaurants and bars
description.html: The Meliá Castilla offers a variety of restaurants so you can enjoy every occasion in a warm and relaxed atmosphere with exquisite and varied cuisine.

restaurants.infoDetail: Opening times: Monday to Friday from 7am to 10:30am and weekends and bank holidays from 7a.m. to 11a.m.
restaurants.descriptionDetail:
After the perfect night’s sleep, start the day in the best possible way. Our breakfast restaurant, Salón Cervantes offers a varied, healthy and full breakfast buffet with more than 100 fresh, top quality products.

  • Extensive choice of cakes, bread, cereals, pastas, etc.
  • Cheese, aromatic oils, cold meat, Iberian products, etc.
  • Dairy Products, fresh fruit, salads, fruit in syrup.
  • Selection of sushi, smoked and marinated fish.
  • Local specialities.
  • Dietary and wholemeal products.
  • Gluten free products.
  • Vegetarian products.
  • Cooking stations for omelettes, scrambled eggs, bacon...
  • Extensive choice of juices, hot drinks, wine and cava.
  • Balanced Breakfast Program by Meliá
  • Location: Lobby.
restaurants.title: CERVANTES -  INTERNATIONAL BREAKFAST BUFFET
restaurants.name: CERVANTES -  INTERNATIONAL BREAKFAST BUFFET
restaurants.introText: After the perfect night’s sleep, start the day in the best possible way. Our breakfast restaurant, Salón Cervantes offers a varied, healthy and full breakfast buffet with more than 100 fresh, top quality products.

restaurants.infoDetail:
Opening times:

  • Lunch: From 1 pm to 4 pm
  • Dinner: From 8 pm to 11:30 pm
restaurants.descriptionDetail:
L'Albufera, a word that in the original Arabic means "litte sea", is a land full of rice fields and sunsets that inspired the most famous dish in Spanish cuisine: the “paella”. It also gives name to a restaurant which ever since it opened in 1983 has provided Madrid with a place to enjoy the rich flavours of Spanish cuisine and the healthy Mediterranean tradition of sharing meals.

Our menu features a wide range of rice dishes and other meat and fish specialities combining superior quality ingredients with the greatest attention to detail in preparation and presentation. We hope you enjoy our market cuisine, full of history and flavour.

The restaurant is divided into two different ambiences for greater privacy: a cosy, covered terrace and a large split level dining area.

Perfect for a special occasion for groups (special menus available) or a corporate event, L’Albufera is ideal for enjoying impeccable service and excellent cuisine in a relaxed atmosphere.

Customers at the L’Albufera restaurant get 2 hours of free parking in the hotel car park.

Free Mini Club service for children aged between 3 and 12 years old, who are dining at L´Albufera.

While they play or share activities, designed for their entertainment and under the supervision of a monitor in a purpose-built room, parents can enjoy a moment of tranquillity.

Mini-Club open on weekends, bank holidays and holiday periods (consult opening hours with the restaurant), and is located at: 1st Floor next to L´Albufera Restaurant.
restaurants.title: L´ALBUFERA RESTAURANT
restaurants.name: L´ALBUFERA RESTAURANT
restaurants.introText:
L'Albufera, a word that in the original Arabic means "litte sea", is a land full of rice fields and sunsets that inspired the most famous dish in Spanish cuisine: the “paella”. It also gives name to a restaurant which ever since it opened in 1983 has provided Madrid with a place to enjoy the rich flavours of Spanish cuisine and the healthy Mediterranean tradition of sharing meals.

(Closed until August 30)

restaurants.title: El PELICANO RESTAURANTE & LOUNGE BAR
restaurants.name: El PELICANO RESTAURANTE & LOUNGE BAR
restaurants.introText:
• A restaurant serving international cuisine, El Pelícano bears all of the hallmarks of Lázaro Rosa Violán, the renowned interior designer, who is able to perfectly combine diverse furniture, materials and finishes, resulting in an eclectic, comfortable and sophisticated space.
  • A large multi-purpose space with a restaurant, bar and terrace in different areas make El Pelícano versatile and flexible.
  • The Lounge Bar is attended by a bartender ready and waiting to prepare a wide range of different drinks and cocktails.
  • The inviting and attractive terrace allows guests to enjoy fresh air at any time.
  • Reservations: 91 203 19 74 · reservas@elpelicanomadrid.com
  • From Monday to Sunday: 12:00 p.m. to 2:00 a.m.

restaurants.title: DISTRITO 798
restaurants.name: DISTRITO 798
restaurants.introText:
• Carefully prepared and surprising cuisine, a fusion of Chifa, Nikkei and Mediterranean styles.
  • Guests visiting Distrito 798 are welcomed by minimalist design and a service style that is also a fusion of Asian, American and European traditions; painstaking attention to detail and respectful and attentive service.
  • The most striking element of all is the food itself, the main objective of all of our visitors. A surprise when they first see the menu, and a surprise when they get their first taste. And as for the wines… Distrito 798 provides a carefully-selected wine list which is a superbly complement to the dining delights which are both jovial and complex at the same time.
  • Distrito 798 offers four different spaces: the sushi bar, two dining rooms, each with a different ambience, and a private room for guests seeking greater intimacy.
  • Entrance via Poeta Joan Maragall, 43. Tel: 912 908 707
  • Opening times: from 12:30 p.m. to 4:30 p.m. and 8 p.m. to 12:00 a.m. Open every day of the week.

restaurants.title: THE LOBBY CAFÉ
restaurants.name: THE LOBBY CAFÉ
restaurants.introText:
• Located next to the main entrance, in the bright and spacious hall, the Lobby Café is an ideal meeting point and a great place to grab a quick breakfast, a delicious Nespresso coffee, your favorite drink or a snack at any time of day.
  • Open from 7.30 a.m. to 11.30 p.m.

hotelSection.title: Meliá Castilla
hotelSection.description:
The Meliá Castilla is considered one of the most emblematic hotels in Madrid, with an appealing blend of perfectly balanced classic and contemporary styles, where peace and urban life are accomplices to delight our guests.

The excellent location, a few minutes from Paseo de la Castellana, 15 minutes from Barajas airport and IFEMA exhibition centre, near Chamartín train station and the Real Madrid Santiago Bernabéu football stadium, makes the Meliá Castilla the perfect choice for your visit to Madrid.
hotelSection.name: melia-castilla
hotelSection.descriptionClaim: Discover Meliá Castilla, a place where business and urban life go hand in hand, thanks to its strategic location
hotelSection.keySellingPoints:
• Great location next to the Paseo de la Castellana, Bernabéu football stadium and the culinary Golden Mile of Madrid
  • Excellent access to the airport, train stations, exhibition centres, museums and main tourist attractions
  • Enjoy our exclusive The Level service and private 480 m2 The Level Lounge with highly personalised service and a great choice of dining options
  • Savour the delicious Spanish cuisine in our 3 restaurants, including L'Albufera, renowned as the best restaurant for rice dishes in Madrid (closed until August 30). Relax on the terrace of the El Pelícano Lounge Bar overlooking the gardens
  • If you are visiting Madrid with the family, you can all enjoy the experience together in our Triple and Connecting Rooms and make the most of special discounted rates. We provide a range of services for kids including a fun MiniClub, our Kids&Co programme, children's menus or high chairs. For more information, see the Family section
  • Our Convention Centre provides more than 7,000 m2 of space in 30 rooms and is the ideal location for any personal or professional event
  • Outdoor pool (check opening dates with the hotel), modern 24-hour gym and Caroli Health Club Boutique

otherFeatures.title: Congresses and events
otherFeatures.description:
Our more than 40 years of experience in organising congresses and events have made our Convention Centre a headquarters for important national and international corporate, financial, cultural and social events.

The success of your meeting is ensured thanks to our versatile facilities, our modern technological equipment and our team of professionals who will help and advice you at all times.
otherFeatures.name: 2804|congresses-and-events

otherFeatures.title: SPACIOUS AND INNOVATIVE CONVENTION CENTRE IN MADRID
otherFeatures.description:
• 32 multifunctional rooms with different dimensions and capacities, in which you can hold meetings and  banquets for up to 700 people, making Meliá Castilla the ideal place for any type of event.
  • Auditorium with capacity for up to 511 people equipped with the most innovative and modern technology.
  • Bright exhibition spaces for congresses, conventions and trade fairs.
  • Our facilities have a modern and stylish decoration, with the possibility to personalise your event.
  • The Convention Centre has a direct access, independent from the hotel.
  • Free Wi-Fi. Dedicated line on request (*)
  • Possibility for private and personalised check-in for groups with prior booking.
  • Personalised and permanent attention guaranteed.
  • Fully equipped Business Centre at your disposal.
  • Hospitality Desk (on request)
  • Food and beverage service for business lunches and dinners, private cocktail parties, receptions, etc.
  • Reserved space for coaches next to the main door of the hotel.
  • Handing out of gifts (*)
  • Organise your event with the latest technology in electronic and audiovisual equipment (plasma screens, projectors, embedded screens, pagers, audio conferencing, videoconferencing, etc.) (prior booking) (*)
  • Possibility to record event (on request) (*)
  • Simultaneous translation service, technical assistance and hostesses, on request (*)
  • Modern fire control system and integrated security cameras.
  • Air conditioning and central heating.

(*) Additional charge
otherFeatures.name: 2804|convention-centre

otherFeatures.title: AUDITORIUM
otherFeatures.description:
Discover a large and functional space, with capacity for up to 511 guests. Each seat is equipped with a modern delegate unit, with features such as electrostatic microphone, word request button, 220W socket, simultaneous translation (with up to 5 translations), interactive voting system, individual flexible lamp and individual ADSL socket, which improves active participation in the congresses and conferences.

The Auditorium is also surrounded by four multifunctional rooms providing a total of more than 1,400 m2, with a capacity for approximately 1,200 people and with the possibility of independent and direct access from the street. Furthermore, this area allows intercommunication with other rooms via audio and video in real time and a technical control room which is soundproofed and independent.
otherFeatures.name: 2804|auditorium

otherFeatures.title: Meeting rooms
otherFeatures.description:
At Meliá Castilla we know that the needs of each client are different. That is why we provide 32 meeting rooms that can adjust to your requirements, ensuring your event is a great success, with personalized service and continuous supervision by an assigned coordinator.

However, it is not a just matter of quantity, but also functionality. Each of the hotel spaces is perfectly defined and independent, allowing the simultaneous organization of several different congresses.

Thanks to its structure, the spaces also complement each other to host major conferences.
otherFeatures.name: 2804|meeting-rooms

otherFeatures.title: FOR THE RECENTLY MARRIED COUPLE
otherFeatures.description:
• Honeymoon suite for the wedding night.
  • Romanticdetails in theroom.
  • Check-out the following day until 4 p.m.
  • “Just Married” breakfast at any time of the day.
  • 4 parking spaces on the wedding day.
  • Menu sampling for 6 people free of charge.
otherFeatures.name: 2804|recently-married

otherFeatures.title: FOR SHARING
otherFeatures.description:
• Menus with totally personalised options.
  • Floral decoration for the tables.
  • Personalised table placings.
  • Wedding cake for cutting and toasts.
  • Civil ceremonyservice.
otherFeatures.name: 2804|for-sharing

otherFeatures.title: FOR YOUR GUESTS
otherFeatures.description:
• Special accommodation rates for your guests.
  • Vegetarian menus and menus for celiacs available (on request).
  • Special menus for children.
otherFeatures.name: 2804|guests

events.title: 2804|conventions
events.introductoryText:
If you are looking to organise a successful congress or event, we invite you to discover our modern, elegant and innovative Convention Centre.

More than 7,000 m2 of meeting space make Meliá Castilla one of the biggest hotels for meetings and events in Europe.

Due to its location and facilities, the Melia Castilla is chosen for meetings, as well as leisure and cultural trips. The hotel is located in the heart of Golden Mile of Gastronomy, next to the Paseo de la Castellana, the Santiago Bernabéu stadium and the Palace Congress of Madrid and only 15 minutes from IFEMA exhibition centre and Madrid Barajas airport.
events.name: Meetings and Conventions

events.title: 2804|banquets
events.introductoryText:
With more than 40 years of experience, the Meliá Castilla offers a personalised variety of menus, cocktails, aperitifs… prepared with the latest culinary techniques which, together with an original presentation and professional service, meet the maximum satisfaction of our clients.

Our Chef Manuel Sánchez will be delighted to advise and tailor menus to suit your needs and preferences and guarantee a personalized attention to make your event unique.

Banquets for up to 400 people in one room.

Cocktail receptions for up to 700 people in one room. Extensive variety of Spanish and international cuisine.

Business dinners.
events.name: Banquets

events.title: 2804|weedings-and-events
events.introductoryText:
We have special proposals for weddings and social events and we promise to organize a unique day for you to share with your family and friends.

The Meliá Castilla is the ideal choice to enjoying unforgettable celebrations with your loved ones. We provide superb service and stylish rooms decorated for every occasion and always in a welcoming atmosphere. Furthermore, we offer a wide range of cuisine with our Mediterranean roots and specially prepared for each one of our clients.
events.description:
We have special proposals for weddings and social events and we promise to organize a unique day for you to share with your family and friends.

The Meliá Castilla is the ideal choice to enjoying unforgettable celebrations with your loved ones. We provide superb service and stylish rooms decorated for every occasion and always in a welcoming atmosphere. Furthermore, we offer a wide range of cuisine with our Mediterranean roots and specially prepared for each one of our clients.
events.name: Weddings and events

description.title: Meetings and events
description.html: This resort in Madrid provides different kinds of meeting rooms, specially designed to the organisation of events, congresses and meetings.

services.title: wellness-center
services.description:
• Discover the new CAROLI HEALTH CLUB BOUTIQUE at the Meliá Castilla.
  • A new health and beauty centre arises in the heart of the city – created with a single and unique philosophy: stop time and harmonise the body and soul.
  • A place where privacy and wellbeing converge. A place where guests can appreciate exclusivity and the luxurious touch of an excellent team of experts who will guide and advise you among a select range of products chosen from amongst the best in the market, offering you specific solutions and exquisite treatments to ensure effectiveness, beauty and serenity. Welcome to a new concept in wellbeing, designed for clients that love all things exclusive.
  • OPENING TIMES: From Monday to Sunday: from 1 p.m. to 9 p.m.. Opening times may vary depending on the season. Please contact the centre to check.
  • For a treatment or massage (*) and/or to use the sauna, please call in advance or during check-in on arrival at the hotel.
  • Location: 1st floor
  • Telephone: (+34) 91 571 18 13. Email: meliacastilla@carolihealthclub.es
services.name: INFORMATION ABOUT OUR WELLNESS CENTRE
services.introText:
• Discover the new CAROLI HEALTH CLUB BOUTIQUE at the Meliá Castilla.
  • A new health and beauty centre arises in the heart of the city – created with a single and unique philosophy: stop time and harmonise the body and soul.

features.title: CAROLI HEALTH CLUB BOUTIQUE FACILITIES
features.description:
As soon as you enter the Caroli Health Club Boutique, you find yourself in another dimension.

Place yourself in the capable hands of our qualified therapists who will help you choose from a wide range of treatments, rituals and the most exclusive products by Angelo Caroli, Maria Galland, Elemis, Babor and many more leading cosmetic firms.

  • 2 treatment cabins
  • 1 private spa with hydromassage for two people, enjoy the Caroli Health Club experience with your partner
  • Facials, body treatments and beauty treatments
  • Massages
  • Special packages
  • Wellbeing package gift
  • Finnish sauna
  • Misty showers
  • Changing rooms, lockers and showers with towels and bathroom amenities
features.name: 2804|caroli-health-club-boutique

features.title: MASSAGES AND BEAUTY TREATMENTS
features.description:
• Exclusive treatments
  • Facials
  • Body treatments
  • Massage rituals
  • Oriental therapies
  • Express treatments
  • Treatments for men
  • Physical therapy treatments
  • Manicure / Pedicure
  • Hair removal (men / women)
  • Daytime and evening make-up
  • Special programmes for two people or for one person
  • Special packs for bride and groom
  • Anti-cellulite and slimming programme for an elegant body
features.name: 2804|massages-beauty-treatments

features.title: PRIVATE SPA-PRIVE
features.description:
• Unique events (celebrations, hen parties, mother and daughter moments) with style and glamour.
  • Personalise your event or incentive with help from our team. We offer an unforgettable spa experience. Choose one of our programmes from the menu for your event or meeting (maximum 5 people).
features.name: 2804|private-spa-prive

features.title: FITNESS STUDIO AND PERSONAL TRAINER SERVICES
features.description:
Free of charge for guests staying at the hotel or hiring the services of our personal trainer. We offer a fully equipped Technogym with areas for cardio-pulmonary activities, bodybuilding, toning and stretching. DON’T FOLLOW TRENDS, CREATE A LIFESTYLE

  • Treadmill
  • Exercise bikes
  • Ellipticals
  • Body building equipment
  • Abdominal bench
  • Weights
  • TV
  • Personal trainer services (*)
  • MIHA BODYTEC system of global electroestimulation (*)
  • Pilates (*)
  • Sport massages (*)

(*) With charge
features.name: 2804|fitness-studio

services.title: facilities
services.name: FACILITIES
services.introText:
• 24 hour gym for the exclusive use of our guests free of charge

(*) Additionalcharge

activities.title: DESTINATION INFORMATION
activities.description: Madrid is the capital of Spain and the political and financial centre of the country. Each year it is visited by thousands of tourists who are always delighted by the range of leisure and cultural activities and the sights the city has to offer.
activities.name: DESTINATION INFORMATION
activities.introText: Madrid is the capital of Spain and the political and financial centre of the country. Each year it is visited by thousands of tourists who are always delighted by the range of leisure and cultural activities and the sights the city has to offer.

features.title: MADRID: THE CITY OF MUSEUMS
features.description: The Spanish capital has 73 museums. Amongst them is the Prado Museum, the Reina Sofia and the Thyssen-Bornemisza where many important paintings are exhibited such as Guernica by Picasso, The Maids of Honour by Velázquez and The Third of May 1808 by Goya. Also in Madrid is the well-known Wax Museum, the Naval Museum, the Museum of America, the Military Museum, the Templo de Debod, the Real Fábrica de Tapices and the Book Museum.
features.name: 2804|madrid-the-city-of-museums

features.title: PLACES OF INTEREST
features.description:
• The Royal Palace.
  • Gran Via-Plaza España.
  • Plaza Mayor.
  • Templo de Debod.
  • Las Cuatro Torres.
  • The Almudena Cathedral.
  • The Calle and Puerta de Alcalá.
  • Plaza de Cibeles.
  • Puerta del Sol.
  • The Parque del Retiro.
  • The Prado Museum.
  • The Reina Sofia Art Centre.
  • The Thyssen Bornemisza Museum.
features.name: 2804|places-of-interest

features.title: WHAT TO DO IN MADRID?
features.description:
• Parque de Atracciones (theme park).
  • Madrid Zoo Aquarium. Located close to the Parque de Atracciones.
  • Warner Park. Rides and shows for all the family.
  • Faunia nature park. Known as the nature theme park, discover more than 5,000 animals and 700 species.
features.name: 2804|what-to-do-in-madrid

features.title: TRADITIONAL CUISINE
features.description:
The traditional dishes are:

  • Cocido madrileño (Madrid stew).
  • Chickpea stew.
  • Madrid tripe.
  • Garlic soup.
  • Spanish potato omelette.
features.name: 2804|traditional-cuisine
